## ExampleClass.method() method

Example function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
method<T>(action: 'succeed' | 'fail', value: T): Result<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  action | 'succeed' \| 'fail' | The action to take (<code>'succeed'</code> or <code>'fail'</code>) |
|  value | T | A value to be returned on success |

<b>Returns:</b>

Result&lt;T&gt;

Returns `Success` with the supplied value if `action` is `succeeed` or `Fail` with an error message in an error occurs.
